TextBlock.Text: NESIA: Okay, Karenia and I have been discussing a plan of mine to see if it is feasible, and we seem to be in agreement that it is worth an attempt. Friends, I believe it may finally be time for us to make our way to the <color=orange>Eye</color>.

KARENIA: We believe that, utilizing the better communion granted by the <color=purple>Heart</color>, we can get the <color=purple>Bramble</color> to grow a node near the <color=orange>Eye of the Universe</color>. Then, we would be able to cross through a linked node here and arrive there instantly.

AZOLLA: Nesia, Karenia, this is quite a bold plan. Much of the foundation seems to be based on unsure concepts with which we have not been able to properly experiment. Do you truly believe this can work?
AZOLLA: Then it sounds as if we have much work ahead. Everyone, begin preparations! It is time to construct the <color=orange>Distant Node Project</color>!
OKALIS: Are you certain? It is time to reunite with our lost friends?
SENNETTI: I am relieved to hear your words, friend. Please, explain your plan.
AZOLLA: That is a bold claim, Nesia. But knowing you, it is not one you would make lightly.
